title: Discord Chat Bot
description:
A Discord bot that reads user input and returns replies.
Created with Discord.js and hosted with Heroku.
Uses various APIs to display data from based on user inputs.
tech: Node.js with Discord.js library. Deployed with Heroku.

title: Maximum Tower
description:
Tower defense game made with funny sprites.
Submission for  the 2016 Fall Game Jam from the Davis Game Development Club.
Disclaimer: Source Code no longer available.
tech: Made with Unity C#. Assets drawn with Piskel.
